Package com.example.mini_pekkas

package com.example.mini_pekkas
  • Class
    Description
    AdminActivity
    AdminActivity is the main activity for organizers, setting up the navigation controller and special navigation bar for admin-specific views only
    AdminEventArrayAdapter
    EventArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of Event objects in a ListView or GridView.
    Event
    This class creates an event object with getters and setters to its attributes
    EventArrayAdapter
    EventArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of Event objects in a ListView or GridView.
    ExampleUITest
    A simple UI test, delete when we have actual UI tests
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    Firebase
    This class is used to interface with Firebase and should be used for all Firebase operations.
    Firebase.CheckListener
    Interface for functions that check a conditional.
    Firebase.DataListRetrievalListener
    Interface for functions that retrieves a list of strings.
    Firebase.DataRetrievalListener
    Interface for functions that retrieve string.
    Firebase.EventListRetrievalListener
    Interface for functions that retrieve an array of events
    Firebase.EventRetrievalListener
    Interface for getEvent.
    Firebase.ImageListRetrievalListener
    Interface for functions that return list of image in Uri format.
    Firebase.ImageRetrievalListener
    Interface for functions that return an image in Uri format.
    Firebase.InitializationListener
    Interface for functions that initializes data and doesn't return anything
    Firebase.NotificationListRetrievalListener
    Interface for functions that retrieve the notifications for this use
    Firebase.QueryRetrievalListener
    Interface for admin functions that retrieve an array of document snapshots to be processed later
    Firebase.UserListRetrievalListener
    Interface for functions that retrieve an array of users
    Firebase.UserRetrievalListener
    Interface for getUser.
    ImageAdapter
    This class is used to display images in a recycler view
    ImageAdapter.ImageViewHolder
    This class is used to display images in a recycler view.
    LoginTests
    Test cases for users according to user stories
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity class is the entry point of the application.
    Notifications
    The Notifications class represents a notification that includes details such as title, description, date, and priority.
    NotificationsArrayAdapter
    The NotificationsArrayAdapter is a custom adapter used to display a list of notifications in a ListView.
    OrganizerActivity
    OrganizerActivity is the main activity for organizers, setting up the navigation controller and Navigation Bar for organizer-specific views.
    OrganizerEventsListViewModel
    Shared ViewModel for the Organizer actions.
    OrganizerEventsListViewModelFactory
    Factory class for creating instances of the OrganizerEventsListViewModel.
    OrganizerTests
    Test cases for Organizers according to user stories
    QRCodeGenerator
    QRCodeGenerator creates a QR code and returns it as a bitmap
    TextDrawable
    TextDrawable is a custom Drawable class that draws a specified text centered on a canvas.
    User
    Represents a User with personal details such name, lastname, email, phone, and facility.
    UserActivity
    UserActivity is the main activity for Users, setting up the navigation controller and Navigation Bar for user-specific activities.
    UserArrayAdapter
    UserArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of User objects in a ListView or GridView.
    UserTests
    Test cases for users according to user stories
